job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Fresh off a successful funding round and in a phase of rapid growth, we are seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to be a core part of our expanding company. You will play a key role in applying the latest research findings to our unique datasets, focusing on the end-to-end development and deployment of AI models. This includes writing production-grade inference code and overseeing the entire lifecycle of these models, from design to deployment. You will be at the forefront of translating recent scientific advancements into practical applications within healthcare, with a strong emphasis on privacy and meeting the needs of healthcare professionals. You will be responsible for setting up and managing the AI infrastructure to enable rapid experimentation and testing and effectively utilizing our unique dataset of spoken and written medical reports. Our deep understanding of how these reports are generated allows us to extract unprecedented value from this data which will contribute to the
   advancement of AI applications in healthcare, ensuring scalability, efficiency, privacy and impact.

   Your Role
     * AI Strategy Development: Formulate and implement a robust AI strategy that aligns with Attendi's healthcare vision.
     * In-House AI Model Development: Lead the creation of innovative AI models, including LLMs and other transformer models, with a focus on healthcare applications.
     * Rapid Prototyping with GPT Models: Quickly test and experiment with GPT models from OpenAI, guiding our in-house development using insights gained.
     * Data Utilization: Leverage Attendi's unique and extensive in-house data to create impactful AI solutions.
     * MLOps Professionalization: Enhance and professionalize our existing MLOps infrastructure, ensuring efficient deployment and maintenance of AI models.
     * Collaboration: Work closely with frontend and backend engineers, as well as the management team, to integrate AI solutions seamlessly across our platforms.
     * Privacy-Centric AI: Develop AI models with a strong emphasis on privacy, always keeping the healthcare professional's needs at the center.

   Attendi's Tech Stack
     * Python for programming
     * PyTorch as ML framework
     * Jupyter for experimenting
     * DVC for data version control
     * Docker for deployment
     * Azure for cloud services
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

Fresh off a successful funding round and in a phase of rapid growth, we are seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to be a core part of our expanding company. You will play a key role in applying the latest research findings to our unique datasets, focusing on the end-to-end development and deployment of AI models. This includes writing production-grade inference code and overseeing the entire lifecycle of these models, from design to deployment. You will be at the forefront of translating recent scientific advancements into practical applications within healthcare, with a strong emphasis on privacy and meeting the needs of healthcare professionals. You will be responsible for setting up and managing the AI infrastructure to enable rapid experimentation and testing and effectively utilizing our unique dataset of spoken and written medical reports. Our deep understanding of how these reports are generated allows us to extract unprecedented value from this data which will contribute to the
   advancement of AI applications in healthcare, ensuring scalability, efficiency, privacy and impact.

   Your Role
     * AI Strategy Development: Formulate and implement a robust AI strategy that aligns with Attendi's healthcare vision.
     * In-House AI Model Development: Lead the creation of innovative AI models, including LLMs and other transformer models, with a focus on healthcare applications.
     * Rapid Prototyping with GPT Models: Quickly test and experiment with GPT models from OpenAI, guiding our in-house development using insights gained.
     * Data Utilization: Leverage Attendi's unique and extensive in-house data to create impactful AI solutions.
     * MLOps Professionalization: Enhance and professionalize our existing MLOps infrastructure, ensuring efficient deployment and maintenance of AI models.
     * Collaboration: Work closely with frontend and backend engineers, as well as the management team, to integrate AI solutions seamlessly across our platforms.
     * Privacy-Centric AI: Develop AI models with a strong emphasis on privacy, always keeping the healthcare professional's needs at the center.

   Attendi's Tech Stack
     * Python for programming
     * PyTorch as ML framework
     * Jupyter for experimenting
     * DVC for data version control
     * Docker for deployment
     * Azure for cloud services

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes end-to-end development and deployment of AI models, including writing production-grade inference code, overseeing the model lifecycle, and applying research findings to datasets. While generative models (LLMs, GPT) are mentioned, the core focus is on applying these to specific healthcare datasets, developing models, and integrating them into production systems. The tech stack (Python, PyTorch, DVC, Docker, Azure) and responsibilities like 'In-House AI Model Development' and 'MLOps Professionalization' align strongly with the definition and evidence profile of an ML Engineer, particularly in productionizing models and managing their lifecycle, rather than solely focusing on building user-facing applications with GenAI as the primary component.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Formulate and implement a robust AI strategy that aligns with Attendi's healthcare vision' directly indicates understanding and aligning technical work with business goals.

The phrase 'effectively utilizing our unique dataset of spoken and written medical reports' and 'Leverage Attendi's unique and extensive in-house data to create impactful AI solutions' points to the use and manipulation of data for AI solutions.

The phrases 'end-to-end development and deployment of AI models', 'writing production-grade inference code', 'Lead the creation of innovative AI models, including LLMs and other transformer models', and 'Quickly test and experiment with GPT models' all describe the core activities of building, training, and adapting models.

The phrase 'Quickly test and experiment with GPT models from OpenAI, guiding our in-house development using insights gained' specifically mentions working with and leveraging generative models for development.
The phrase 'Develop AI models with a strong emphasis on privacy' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of models.

The phrase 'Work closely with frontend and backend engineers, as well as the management team, to integrate AI solutions seamlessly across our platforms' indicates the need to integrate AI into broader software systems.

The phrase 'overseeing the entire lifecycle of these models, from design to deployment' and 'Enhance and professionalize our existing MLOps infrastructure, ensuring efficient deployment and maintenance of AI models' directly addresses the operational aspects of managing models in production.

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with frontend and backend engineers, as well as the management team
translating recent scientific advancements into practical applications
core part of our expanding company
